original_title: Sri Lanka to buy Enoxaparin injections from Gulf Pharma, Slim Pharmaceuticals
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s sate health service will buy 1.45 million Enoxaparin Sodium injections, used to treat patients with heart disease, from two companies, Cabinet spokesman Bandula Gunawardena said.
Slim Pharmaceuticals (Pvt) Limited will supply 1,000,000 Enoxaparin Sodium pre-filled syringes used to prevent and treat harmful blood clots.

The Cabinet had approved the award of the tenders to the two companies after calling international bids for the procurement of 1,450,000 syringes of 0.6 ml of IU 6,000 Enoxaparin Sodium injections. (Colombo/Dec6/2023)
